text: Tribute to Archaon||Archaon will be pleased
Raze for the Hound||You raze this region and erect a monument to the Great Hound.

Raise Altar â€“ Eagle||Pillage and raze this region while erecting an Altar to the Great Eagle.\\n\\nAttaining allegiance to this God will reward you with powerful benefits, potentially allowing access to a mighty Lord of Change, [[img:icon_god_eagle]][[/img]][[col:yellow]]Azrik the Maze Keeper[[/col]], who can be recruited to fight for your faction.\\n\\n{{tr:ui_text_replacements_localised_text_wh3_dlc27_nor_allegiance_altar_landmark_limitation}}
